item.title: Video content creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled content creator to join our team and help create engaging and informative content for our app designed to reduce stress, frustration with an innovative dinner solution.  Also to help simplify life organization for families. As a content creator, you will be responsible for creating video content, possibly researching and generating ideas for blog articles, social media posts, and in-app content that resonates with our target audience. Your content should be tailored to the needs of busy families.  Experience in family organization or related topics is a plus.

Skills required:
-Video content creation
-Video editing skills


This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months, starting as soon as possible. We are looking for an intermediate-level content creator who can deliver high-quality content on a consistent basis.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 26, 2024 00:04 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
